questions.question: Who took care of the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم after the death of his grandfather Abdul Muttalib?
Which clan was the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم from?
What work did the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم do until the age of 40?
When did Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم travel to Syria and with whom?
questions.answer: With his uncle Abu Talib at age 12
options: With his uncle Abu Talib at age 12

questions.question: Who was Khadijah (R.A)?
Why did Khadijah (R.A) want to marry Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم?
questions.answer: Because of his truthfulness and good conduct
options: Because of his truthfulness and good conduct

questions.question: At what age did Khadijah (R.A) marry Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم?
How old was Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم at the time of the marriage?
What did the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم give his wife Khadijah as Mahr (dowry)?
Was Khadijah (R.A) a widow before she married the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم?
How many children did the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم have with Khadijah (R.A)?
Did the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم have any other children?
options: Yes, two sons from other wives
Yes, three daughters from other wives

questions.question: Name the 11 wives of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم.
questions.answer: Khadijah, Sawdah, Aaisha, Hafsah, Zaynab bint Jahsh, Umm Salamah, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Juwairiyah, Umm Habeebah, Safiyyah, Maymoonah
options: Khadijah, Sawdah, Aaisha, Hafsah, Zaynab bint Jahsh, Umm Salamah, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Juwairiyah, Umm Habeebah, Safiyyah, Maymoonah
Khadijah, Sawdah, Aaisha, Hafsah, Umm Salamah, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Juwairiyah, Umm Habeebah, Safiyyah, Maymoonah, Ramlah
Khadijah, Sawdah, Aaisha, Hafsah, Zaynab bint Jahsh, Umm Salamah, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Umm Habeebah, Safiyyah, Maymoonah, Fatimah
Khadijah, Aaisha, Hafsah, Zaynab bint Jahsh, Umm Salamah, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Juwairiyah, Umm Habeebah, Safiyyah, Maymoonah, Fatimah

questions.question: Name the son-in-laws of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم.
questions.answer: Uthman ibn Affan, Ali ibn Abi Talib, Abul Aas ibn Al-Rabi'
options: Ali ibn Abi Talib, Umar ibn Khattab, Abul Aas ibn Al-Rabi'
Uthman ibn Affan, Ali ibn Abi Talib, Abul Aas ibn Al-Rabi'
Uthman ibn Affan, Abu Bakr, Abul Aas ibn Al-Rabi'
Uthman ibn Affan, Ali ibn Abi Talib, Khalid ibn Walid

questions.question: Name the grandchildren of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم.
questions.answer: Ali, Umaamah, Abdullah, Al-Hasan, Al-Hussain, Muhsin, Umm Kulthoom, Zaynab
options: Ali, Abdullah, Al-Hasan, Al-Hussain, Umm Kulthoom, Zaynab
Umaamah, Abdullah, Al-Hasan, Al-Hussain, Muhsin, Umm Kulthoom, Zaynab
Ali, Umaamah, Abdullah, Al-Hasan, Al-Hussain, Muhsin, Umm Kulthoom, Zaynab
Ali, Abdullah, Al-Hasan, Al-Hussain, Muhsin, Umm Kulthoom, Zaynab

questions.question: Were all the wives of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم widows or divorcees before they married him?
options: No, all were never married before

questions.question: Name the 6 paternal aunties of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم.
questions.answer: Safiyyah, Arwa, Aatiqah, Umm Hakeem al-Baida, Barrah, Umaymah
options: Safiyyah, Arwa, Aatiqah, Umm Hakeem al-Baida, Barrah, Umaymah
Safiyyah, Arwa, Umm Hakeem al-Baida, Barrah, Umaymah, Ruqayyah
Safiyyah, Arwa, Aatiqah, Umm Hakeem al-Baida, Umaymah, Ruqayyah
Safiyyah, Aatiqah, Umm Hakeem al-Baida, Barrah, Umaymah, Ruqayyah

questions.question: Name the grandmothers of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم.
questions.answer: Faatimah bint Omar and Barrah bint Abdul Uzza
options: Faatimah bint Omar and Barrah bint Abdul Uzza
Faatimah bint Omar and Aminah bint Wahb
Halah bint Wahb and Barrah bint Abdul Uzza
Aminah bint Wahb and Halah bint Wahb

questions.question: How many times is the name of Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم mentioned in the Holy Quran?
